name: cityscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view or image of a city: His watercolours show people in a desolate, ash-grey cityscape.
Alexander Spatari/Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe park is a small patch of green in the cityscape.The work consists of blocks, arranged in stacks, that suggest an abstract cityscape.There is an exhibition of her photographs, mostly landscapes and cityscapes.These new towers are ugly intrusions into the cityscape.
